meanings.sent1: The mushrooms in the dark, damp cave were hypogeal.
meanings.sent2: The roots of the plant were hypogeal, hidden beneath the soil.
meanings.sent3: The hypogeal creatures threw a surprise underground party.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like hypogeal roots, deeply hidden from view.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led to a hypogeal chamber filled with ancient artifacts.

meanings.definition: Located or occurring beneath the surface of the ground.
meanings.sent1: The hypogeal tunnel provided a secret passage under the castle walls.
meanings.sent2: The buried treasure was found in a hypogeal chamber deep underground.
meanings.sent3: The hypogeal river flowed silently beneath the city streets.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were like hypogeal springs, bubbling up unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The hypogeal roots of the tree stretched far and wide, unseen by passersby.
